description:
Summit sunsets are spectacular, and they're even better without sore feet. These socks are made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that regulates foot temperature to keep your feet warm in the cool and cool in the heat.

  • Cushioned sole and ankle provides great comfort without bulk
  • Ribbed performance knit ensures no slipping, no bunching or blisters
  • True Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Sunset Ridge Lightweight Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Unisex
